title: Implement Dirichlet and Beta distributions
body_html:
This Implements Dirichlet and Beta distributions. The samplers useGamma.sample() and the reparameterized gradients are computed with numerical approximations to the cdf. The computed gradients are accurate to within 1% relative error for a wide range of parameters.

For details of the derivation, see this Jupyter Notebook. Math has been reviewed by @martinjankowiak

body:
This Implements `Dirichlet` and `Beta` distributions. The samplers use`Gamma.sample()` and the reparameterized gradients are computed with numerical approximations to the `cdf`. The computed gradients are accurate to within 1% relative error for a wide range of parameters.

For details of the derivation, see this [Jupyter Notebook](https://github.com/fritzo/notebooks/blob/master/beta-reparameterized.ipynb). Math has been reviewed by @martinjankowiak
